subject: Order #SSN4030
description_text:
Just checking on the status of my order.  Order page says "It's on the
way".  It doesn't have any tracking information.

Thanks
Joey Brewer

conversations.body_text: Hi Joey Brewer, We apologize for the delay in shipping; we will track the shipment for you.

Ok, thank you. How will it be shipped?

On Mon, Dec 22, 2025, 7:50 AM support@simsonn.com
Hi Joey Brewer,     I noticed your package has been delivered. Did you not receive it?  https://www.fedex.com.cn/fedextrack/?trknbr=886674669998&trkqual=12029~886674669998~FDEG

I received the pedals,  but not the upgrade kit I got for my older pedals.

On Wed, Dec 24, 2025, 6:16 AM support@simsonn.com
Still haven't seen any updates to my order.
Hi Joey Brewer,  I apologize for the delayed response.    The upgrade kit you purchased should already be included in the pedal. Please verify this.
